# cloudtemple_iam_company (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `iam_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_iam_company" "company" {}

output "company" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_iam_company.company.name
}
```
